Articles.Content:
I've been having a problem with my game. Sometimes when I change scenes some of the mod icons on the toolbar will start duplicating themselves, the only ones that seem to do this are persistent rotation, servo controller, and waypoint manager, these icons also seem to duplicate themselves on the main menu when I quit from my save. I'm not sure what's causing this but I'm going to attach my mod list both debug and output logs and then image of the problem any help is appreciated. Nearly all my mods were installed through CKAN. Thanks in advance!

debug log

Output log

picture of problem, (couldn't insert)

I'm voting for this question, as I'm having the same issue. Will see if anyone has the solution.
Edit: I will add that my icons that are duplicating are all that stryth has, and including USI's life support green box icon, USI's colonization menu thing, and USI's WOLF icon.

Edited August 13, 2021 by bobby72006
Explaining the slight difference of the problem that I'm having when compared to stryth's.
